columns.Railway_ID: The unique identifier for each railway.
columns.Manager_ID: The unique identifier for the manager overseeing the railway.
columns.From_Year: The starting year of management for the railway.

railway_manage.table_description: The table tracks railway management assignments and their durations.

columns.Railway_ID: The unique identifier for each railway.
columns.Railway: The name or designation of the railway.
columns.Builder: The name of the builder or manufacturer of the railway.
columns.Built: The year the railway was constructed.
columns.Wheels: The wheel arrangement specification of the railway.
columns.Location: The geographical location of the railway.
columns.ObjectNumber: The unique reference number assigned to the railway object.

railway.table_description: The table catalogs various railways and their characteristics.

columns.Train_ID: The unique identifier for each train.
columns.Train_Num: The assigned number designation for the train.
columns.Name: The official name or title of the train.
columns.From: The departure location of the train.
columns.Arrival: The scheduled arrival time of the train.
columns.Railway_ID: The identifier linking the train to its railway.

train.table_description: The table records details about various trains and their schedules.

columns.Manager_ID: The unique identifier for each manager.
columns.Name: The full name of the manager.
columns.Country: The country where the manager is based.
columns.Working_year_starts: The year when the manager began working.
columns.Age: The current age of the manager.
columns.Level: The management level of the manager.

manager.table_description: The table stores information about managers and their qualifications.
